hero.title: Spend it like money.
hero.desc: Making the world that trades mobile data for anything

values.description1: Data is already being used for anything, everywhere. Empo helps you spend your mobile data seamlessly wherever you are.
values.description2: Empo supports your daily life so that you can focus on your work, friends, and family with no worries.
values.description3: Empo is building a culture, in which people share, save, purchase, and exchange mobile data freely in cash beyond simple consumption.

empoapp.title: A new way to share mobile data
empoapp.description: Unused data is helpless and expensive to pay. What if we could sell your unused data? It's the first step for the mobile data trade.

datascanner.title: Curation for more data, but at a half price
datascanner.description: Data plan is the most expensive subscription. For seamless data flow at a half price out of 2,022 data plans. Datascanner is your personal mobile store.

datascannerPlan.title: datascanner has 2,020 data plans
datascannerPlan.description: Data plan DB is always up to date for precise curation.

empoapp1.body: I and my friends have installed this app. it easy to share data .Now the sign ups are quiet easy .for extra data for pubg update i used it and its fantastic
empoapp1.name: S*lim T Viswanath

empoapp2.body: Good app. Better with sharing to data. With this we can earn. Because, network and time with can be counted as a valuable asset.
empoapp2.name: P*rushottam Batav

empoapp3.body: The idea behind the app is really good.ðŸ˜Š
empoapp3.name: I*ternet Wanderer

datascanner1.body: Although there is not much interest in the topic of affordable rates in Korea, It was helpful to know the need for the affordable rate plan and it solved my questions about the reasonable plan.
datascanner1.name: *Young Choi

datascanner2.body: The design is well organized. It doesn't feel like a telecom commercial. Also, it's useful.
datascanner2.name: *Yeon Kim

datascanner3.body: Like a fin-tech company, it seems to provide tremendous confidence in information! It was good to have the necessary information what I needed.
datascanner3.name: *Jin Jeong

brandStory.title: Night sky is the Empo's color.

bi.description:
Empo abbreviates an emporium meaning a shop or market.
The logo represents a platform that connects people with mobile data trade.
